column5: Well just like every other time I put the boat in the water the winds were crazy today.  Got on the water a little late around 8am off by noon.  Fishing was slower than normal for this lake.  Caught about 15 fish today.  Missed about 10 more on the topwater frog ( 8 by my wife).  Nice to get the boat in water none the less.  Largest fish was just shy of 4lbs           Picture doesn"t do this turtles size justice.  2 of them were on side by side rocks and they were massive about 18" across not length wise       Thanks for looking Ian
Nice fish!!!,if that's a slow 4 hrs,where do I sign up Lol.
Really cool colourations on those bass. Looks like a solid day on the water!
Great photo of the boy with the huge bass!  Nice fishing outing. Yeah!
Those are some nice fish. And the young lad looks like he's no slouch with the rod either Great day on the water with the family
Nice shooting ...im sure your sons smile reflects the pride in your heart
Always nice to get out with the kids. Great job.
Dealing with wind in a small boat isn't fun, but you and your son caught some nice bass.

Great lookin fish Your son looks like a real pro.Bass fishing was tough where i was too, A low pressure front moved through around 6.30am and the bite stopped almost right away.We lost a few good ones too.Almost like they weren't committing to the bait.

Thanks for the comments folks.  Always fun fishing with the family.  Looking at my photos I think I am gonna have to master the extended arm pose to make the fish look bigger LOL.  If you notice our arms are bent in all the photos no illusion tricks here.    Ian
Solid fish all day long there.....well done!
